text: (Woh Allah ki khufiya tadbeer hi thi) jab usne kaha, â€œ aey Isa! Ab main tujhey wapas le lunga aur tujhko apni taraf utha lunga aur jinhon ne tera inkar kiya unse (yani inki maiyat se aur unke gandey maahol mein unke saath rehne se) tujhey paak kardunga aur teri pairwi karne walon ko qayamat tak un logon par balaadast rakhunga jinhon ne tera inkar kiya hai. Phir tum sabko aakhir mere paas aana hai, us waqt main un baaton ka faisla kardunga jinmein tumhare darmiyan ikhtilaf hua hai
